version_description:
Enjoy our latest update with:

- New feature "Pay with Wing" for quick payment to Merchant/Retailer without swapping your Wing card
- Improved UI to Send Money with switch control to choose "Wing to Wing" or "Wing WeiLuy"
- Support Barcode/QR code scan for Bills Payment or Pay with Wing
- Enable OTP verification when adding new Wing Account
- Remove Ad section in bottom of Home Screen
- You can see many more transactions in your account with detailed information
- Fixed other issues
- Fixed issue when updating to the new version of the app

Enjoy our latest update with:

- Enable OTP verification when adding new Wing Account
- Remove Ad section in bottom of Home Screen
- You can see many more transactions in your account with detailed information
- Fixed other issues
- Fixed issue when updating to the new version of the app

Enjoy our latest update with:

- New feature "Pay with Wing" for quick payment to Merchant/Retailer without swapping your Wing card
- Improved UI to Send Money with switch control to choose "Wing to Wing" or "Wing WeiLuy"
- Support Barcode/QR code scan for Bills Payment or Pay with Wing
- Enable OTP verification when adding new Wing Account
- Remove Ad section in bottom of Home Screen
- You can see many more transactions in your account with detailed information
- Fixed other issues
- Fixed issue when updating to the new version of the app

- Added new function to purchase Voucher for Phone Top Up
- Several bug fixes and usability improvements

- Added new function to purchase Voucher for Phone Top Up
- Several bug fixes and usability improvements

Enjoy the latest update for all available features and improvement:

- Experience the new look and feel of the app home screen; it's more convenient to manage your multiple accounts by just swiping the Wing Account, show/hide the balance information, access transaction history and enable QR code for Wing Account number
- Send money to another Wing Account by scanning the QR code
- Share transaction information with the recipient after successful transaction of Wing-2-Wing and Wing WeiLuy
- Get the phone op Up instruction for voucher top up based on each operator
- Add the logo for each biller
- Enable App Session Timeout allowing the user to select time interval for the app to logout
- Other improvements and several bugs fixed

Enjoy the latest update for all available features and improvement:

§ Secure registration process
§ Step-by-step registration tutorial for newly registered user
§ home screen guide for newly registered user
§ Business Payment function for small and medium enterprises
§ Biller search function for faster & easier bill payments
§ Other improvements & several bugs fixed

Enable 3D Secure Code for Online Card:
- Mastercard Secure Code is a private code for your Online Card that gives you an additional layer of online shopping security at a accepted 3D Secure merchant.
- Added protection to keep transactions private

- WCX Location: An accurate map location of Wing agents with your area
- Splash Screen: A Walk-through of various services from Wing
- Notification: A location to view recent notifications including transactions

- Wing To World: Country search function updated

- Promotions & Discounts: A hundred of promotions & discounts from our partners is available on one single app now. Keep the app up-to-date to get those discounted pages refresh and enjoy your time.

What’s New:
- Code 2 Wing: Cashing in money to your Wing account is super easy now. With Code 2 Wing, you can get the money which received from your friend or family through over-the-counter’s service (Send money at Wing’s agent) or from inbound service with MoneyGram into your account just only on single Wing Money app.
- Bug fixes and improvements

What’s New:
- Code 2 Wing: Cashing in money to your Wing account is super easy now. With Code 2 Wing, you can get the money which received from your friend or family through over-the-counter’s service (Send money at Wing’s agent) or from inbound service with MoneyGram into your account just only on single Wing Money app.
- Bug fixes and improvements

WHAT'S NEW

Bug fixed & app improvement
Bug fixed & app improvement

• Favorite function improvement! You can save your favorite transaction in your Wing Money App and repeat the transaction with a few swipes regardless of bill payment and local/international money transfer
• Other improvement and bugs fixed

• Favorite function improvement! You can save your favorite transaction in your Wing Money App and repeat the transaction with a few swipes regardless of bill payment and local/international money transfer
• Other improvement and bugs fixed

Changes:
· Updated Market Place Flow
· In WingMall, Remove Shop Now Screen and Place Product Category Screen Instead

Changes:
· Updated Market Place Flow
· In WingMall, Remove Shop Now Screen and Place Product Category Screen Instead
Bug fixes & other improvements
Bug fixes & other improvements

Catch up with latest updates and feature enhancements:

- Offline WingPoints program is the first and unique loyalty program offering splendid benefits to customers. The uniqueness of seamless payment experiences, earn points to offset next transaction amount or to redeem products from Redemption Catalogue
- Online WingPoints is a new service enabling customer to do online payment using either points only or points with e-wallet (Wing account)
- WingPoints Phone Top Up enables users to redeem the earned points from merchants nationwide to top up phone
- Marketplace is an online service where Wing customers can do online shopping, booking transportation, creating saving account, requesting loan and more via Wing Money App. You could also find discounts and special offers there
- Schedule Payment service assists you to set up payment automatically, so you would never forget or be late for any payday!
- Bug fixed and other improvements

- Offline WingPoints program is the first and unique loyalty program offering splendid benefits to customers. The uniqueness of seamless payment experiences, earn points to offset next transaction amount or to redeem products from Redemption Catalogue

- WingPoints Phone Top Up enables users to redeem the earned points from merchants nationwide to top up phone
- Marketplace is an online service where Wing customers can do online shopping, booking transportation, creating saving account, requesting loan and more via Wing Money App. You could also find discounts and special offers there
- Schedule Payment service assists you to set up payment automatically, so you would never forget or be late for any payday!
- Bug fixed and other improvements
